mapper.select: select count(*) from board where delyn = 'false' and subject ilike '%' || #{search} || '%' content ilike '%' || #{search} || '%' usrname ilike '%' || #{search} || '%' (subject ilike '%' || #{search} || '%' or content ilike '%' || #{search} || '%') 1 = 1
mapper.insert: insert into board (num, usrname, pwd, subject, content, refgroup, refdepth, reforder, cnt, delyn, deldate, date) values (#{num}, #{usrname}, #{pwd}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{refgroup}, default, default, '0', default, default, now())
